name: Shoppe
description:
Take ownership of a brand new store in a small, adventurer-rich frontier town with countless opportunities for profit and growth! Climb your way to wealth starting with a couple shelves and a counter to stand behind, and grow your shoppe into a bustling hub of commerce boasting a wide variety of goods. Utilize the many adventurers staying in town to commission expeditions to uncharted lands or reap the rewards from those simply looking to sell what they have, and turn the treasures they return with into usable coin by selling it to the townsfolk. Finally, make good use of that coin by contracting more adventurers, or invest in your future by purchasing decorations, upgrades, or new furniture for your shoppe that can enhance your capacity for profit in various ways.

During your rise to the top, you will encounter a variety of individuals, some far more 'eccentric' than others (why does that hooded guy have so many things stuffed into his cloak?)! Some may find you while you work, others may reside elsewhere in town. In addition, you may find certain occurances or events in town that influence how sought-after certain goods are. Be sure to take a look around town and keep an eye on the news!

Features
  • Buying items!
  • Selling items!!
  • Change the furniture in your store to provide different bonuses!
  • Upgrade that furniture to provide even more bonuses!!
  • Visit the town!
  • Townspeople to speak with!!
  • Random events!
  • Wandering cats and upset adventurers!!
  • Coins!!!

Shoppe is still early in development and is frequently adding new features to the game. Be sure to check back often to see what's changed, and if you feel so inclined, offer any feedback or suggestions you might have! Thank you for playing!
